sentences.sentence: He was free to marry whomever he chose.
sentences.translation: 他看上了谁就可以和谁结婚。

sentences.sentence: If you can start the conversation with a question other than "What do you do for a living?", you'll be able to get a lot more interesting conversation out of whomever it is you're talking to.
sentences.translation: 如果你能以“你以什么谋生？”以外的问题开始交谈，你就能从与你交谈的人那里获得更多有趣的对话。

sentences.sentence: But I also find that it allows me to be whomever I want.
sentences.translation: 不过，我也发现，这个名字也让我可以做我想做的任何人。
